column1: Smoque BBQ////This has got be my favorite bbq joint in the city right now.  I've been here three times already
column2: yet with each time I leave wanting to come back even more!  Smoque's had an incredible amount of publicity since they opened.  It's been on Metromix
column6: and Dives on the Food Network!!   Everything about this place screams bbq
column7: from the shack-line appearance on the outside to the small
column8: cozy interior w/ a heavenly aroma of smoke and goodness in the air.
